title: Back from ShadowCon!
author: verias
text:
So, yeah, got back after playing daredevil with the weather. Apologies for the delay on the page. Hope you guys enjoy!

Also! Hopefully I'll have a convention plan/schedule together soon-ish to pass to J to throw up here on the site!

Enjoy!

Keith W.

replies.author: Adamas*Guest*
replies.text: Interesting. so the first Arcana created from the war was Death?

replies.author: Bruudwin*Guest*
replies.text:
helllllll yeah welcome back you dudes! these series are awesome as always!

just re checked after a helluva long duration of a blue moon and y'all are back! thought you fellers were dead!

replies.author: Gunsolo*Guest*
replies.text: Wait, the Transformer died in part 16 didn't he? Is he immortal (makes sense I guess since he's Death), or are these sequences shown out of order?

replies.author: JGray
replies.text: Adamas: While the Fool is the first card of the Major Arcana it felt to me that the transformer should be the herald of a change in the status of existence.
